channel.title: Portforward problem
channel.description: soo far ive been getting all problems but i think im doing it right heres what im doing 1. i have utorrent with the ports but it says the port is not open 2. im trying to allow it through my firewall but need help with it 3. i have 192.168.1.1 to log on my router but when i portforward it does nothing to help where do i portforward my server on my router for it to work ?

item.title: Portforward problem
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

1- Set in your client.java the Ipâ€™s to ur No-ip host
2- compile
3-open no-ip client (DUC)
4-open source
5- open utorrent
6- set port to 43594
7-close source
8-open source
9- DONE!
